mapper.select: SELECT prg_no, prg_nm, cns_no, prg_nope, prg_cd, prg_ymd, prg_hr, prg_place FROM grprograms WHERE req_end > DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%Y%m%d')
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO grprograms (prg_nm, cns_no, prg_cd, prg_nope, prg_content, prg_schdl, req_end, prg_dow, prg_nmtm) VALUES (#{prg_nm}, #{cns_no}, #{prg_cd}, #{prg_nope}, #{prg_content}, #{prg_schdl}, #{req_end}, #{prg_dow}, #{prg_nmtm})
